place: 7 rue Edmond Valentin, Paris 7e, Tél: Inv. 50.38
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Gorman: I went to the American Express Office. The price with 20% rebate for return ticket Touquet-Paris, 7 days stay at Hotel Carlton, 19th to 26th inst is 600 frs per head plus hotel—bus fare Etapies—Le Touquet and back, thus made up:
